bibl.title: Lucia CRISCUOLO, Giovanni GERACI e Carla SALVATERRA (a cura di), Simblos. Scritti di storia antica (Bologna, 1995) pp. 33-39
bibl.note: "I want to discuss some documents which might shed further light on the events of summer 145 but were overlooked in both Chauveau's discussion [Un été 145, BIFAO 90 (1990) pp. 135-168, 2 fac-sim. et 4 pll.] and my own [Die Alleinherrschaft des Ptolemaios VIII. im Jahre 164/163 v. Chr. und der Name Euergetes, Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II (Athens, 1988) pp. 405-433]." - Pp. 37-38: chronological survey of the ostraca in which the sitologos Ptolemaios, the antigrapheus Hermôn and the taxpayer Diphilos appear.
